sense.def:
To raise something
pomeni, da nekaj prestavimo v višji položaj.

seg.quote: He tried to raise the window, but the sash cord was broken.
She raised her eyebrows in surprise.
He stood on a raised platform.

sense.def:
To raise the rate or level of something
pomeni, da stopnjo ali raven nečesa zvišamo.

seg.quote: The maximum speed was raised to seventy miles per hour.

sense.def:
To raise the standard of something
pomeni, da nekaj izboljšamo.

seg.quote: Putting teachers in day nurseries would raise standards.

sense.def:
To raise one's voice
pomeni glasneje govoriti.

To raise money for a charity or a cause
pomeni pregovoriti ljudi, da prispevajo sredstva za dobrodelno dejavnost.

To raise a child
pomeni skrbeti za otroka, dokler ni polnoleten.

seg.quote: It was no place to raise a child.

sense.def:
To raise a particular type of animal or crop
pomeni gojiti določeno vrsto živali ali pridelovati kaj na polju.

seg.quote: He moved to Petaluma to raise chickens.

sense.def:
To raise a subject, objection, or question
pomeni omeniti neko témo ali vprašanje, navesti ugovor ali opozoriti nanje.

seg.quote: You would have to raise that with Mr Gerran personally.
